title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 32.14 - Use by registrant or operator
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 32.14 - Use by registrant or operator

State Regulations
A valid current ID card shall be kept with the vehicle to
which it applies and it must be produced upon demand by any law enforcement
officer or to any person with whom an accident has occurred. Failure to produce
an ID card when required may result in a charge of uninsured operation and
revocation of driver's license and/or registration
privileges. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
32.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
